interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Kea Health Manuka Honey Moisturizer Cream - For Cracked Hands and Feet - Eczema and Psoriasis Treatment - Anti Itch Relief for Dry Skin - With Lanolin and Olive Oil Review Date: 2021/10/13 Store: Kea Health Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Kea Health', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '7.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Hands, Feet', 'Package Dimensions': '2.95 x 2.91 x 2.72 inches; 8.15 Ounces'} Review Text: This is a thick, rich cream that, for me, has worked wonders on dry, scaly skin. My hands needed some serious help and after using this cream for just a few days, I have seen much improvement. My skin is much soft, the cracks are disappearing, and they feel moisturized. The cream is thick, a little goes a long way, and I’ve found it’s best to really rub it in, not list skim it over the skin and leave it. I have also been using the cream on a particularly itchy patch of skin on my back, again, with excellent results.
There is no scent.
The cream is made from several natural ingredients, most notably Manuka honey from New Zealand, something new to me, but that has been used for centuries in New Zealand. I’m glad it made its way to me in the USA! Review Title: Wonderful! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Bath Tub Pillow Bathtub Pillows Headrest with Neck and Back Support, 4D Air Mesh Bath Accessories, 6 Strong Suction Cups, Hot Tub, Jacuzzi Home Spa for Women Men Apriluna {'Brand': 'Apriluna', 'Material': 'Foam, Mesh', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '15.75 x 7.95 x 5.55 inches; 15.24 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BP4D', 'Manufacturer': 'Apriluna'} This pillow is soft and comfy and makes for a relaxing bath. I love the soft fabric that covers the pillow, such an improvement over the plastic pillow I had been using. With six suction cups, it stays in place in my free-standing tub, and it’s just the right size to cradle my head and also cushion my upper back. There is an attached hook to hang the pillow to dry when done bathing. Included with the pillow are a tool to loosen the suction cups from the tub, a storage bag, and a bag of rose petals for your first bath with the new pillow. A very nice pillow! Soft and comfortable Kea Health Manuka Honey Moisturizer Cream - For Cracked Hands and Feet - Eczema and Psoriasis Treatment - Anti Itch Relief for Dry Skin - With Lanolin and Olive Oil Kea Health {'Brand': 'Kea Health', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '7.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Hands, Feet', 'Package Dimensions': '2.95 x 2.91 x 2.72 inches; 8.15 Ounces'} This is a thick, rich cream that, for me, has worked wonders on dry, scaly skin. My hands needed some serious help and after using this cream for just a few days, I have seen much improvement. My skin is much soft, the cracks are disappearing, and they feel moisturized. The cream is thick, a little goes a long way, and I’ve found it’s best to really rub it in, not list skim it over the skin and leave it. I have also been using the cream on a particularly itchy patch of skin on my back, again, with excellent results.
There is no scent.
The cream is made from several natural ingredients, most notably Manuka honey from New Zealand, something new to me, but that has been used for centuries in New Zealand. I’m glad it made its way to me in the USA! Wonderful!
profile:
**User Summary:**

This user prioritizes comfort and relaxation in their bath experience, demonstrated by their preference for soft, high-quality materials. They appreciate functional design features, such as suction cups for stability and convenient accessories like drying hooks and storage bags, indicating a focus on practicality alongside comfort. Enhancements to their bathing ritual, like rose petals, are valued as they contribute to a soothing environment. Their inclination towards self-care products is reinforced by their positive experience with a thick, rich cream for dry skin, which has proven effective for treating conditions like eczema and psoriasis. The cream's natural ingredients, particularly Manuka honey, resonate with their preference for quality and effectiveness in wellness products. Ratings indicate a tendency to favor well-reviewed items, and their strong appreciation for improvements highlights an openness to new options that enhance comfort and functionality. Overall, this user values products that aid relaxation, promote skin health, and contribute positively to their personal wellness routines, ensuring their self-care rituals remain spa-like and rejuvenating at home.
